cause.description:
We want to show the troops that we support their efforts, and that we are praying for them to come home safely.
ANY MONEY DONATED GOES TO THE ARMY EMERGENCY RELIEF FOUNDATION!!!
1. Let our Soliders know we love and care about them!!
2. Help our soliders come home safely!!
cause.mission: to show our troops that we support their efforts in Iraq.
cause.name: Support the U.S. Soldiers
